content.rendered:
Freebird Airlines is a Turkish charter airline based in Florya, Bakirköy, Istanbul. Its main base is Istanbul Airport with secondary bases at Antalya Airport and Dalaman Airport. The airline was established in June 2000 and started operations on 5 April 2001 with a service between Istanbul and Lyon.

Freebird Airlines Contact Address, Phone, Fax, Email and Website

Freebird Airlines Address : Güzeloba, 156/A, Barınaklar Blv., 07230 Muratpaşa/Antalya, Turkey

Phone number : +90 (242) 349 33 00
Fax: +90 (242) 330 34 05
Email: info@freebirdairlines.com

Freebird Airlines Official website : https://www.freebirdairlines.com/en/

Fleet size: 10

  • Airbus A320-200

Freebird Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Freebird Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Freebird Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Freebird Airlines office in Turkey Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Freebird Airlines office in Turkey: (click on the stars below)
